author: Eun-Young Jeong
title: South Korean Figure Skater Kim Yuna Has Another Olympic Moment
text:
PYEONGCHANG, South Korea—South Korean figure skater Kim Yuna won a figure skating gold medal in 2010 and narrowly missed another in 2014. Now retired, she became the darling of the Olympics once again on Friday night—even though she has no shot of winning any medals.
The two-time Olympic medalist lit the torch at the Opening Ceremony for the 2018 Pyeongchang Games. At the top of a mounted stage, Kim received the torch from two athletes in the joint inter-Korean women’s hockey team. Wearing an elegant white dress and a pair...
